content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/listapedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


select SUBSTRING(Cadastro,7,4)+SUBSTRING(Cadastro,4,2),count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/listapedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
group by SUBSTRING(Cadastro,7,4)+SUBSTRING(Cadastro,4,2)
order by SUBSTRING(Cadastro,7,4)+SUBSTRING(Cadastro,4,2)
